context: Check Point Software Technologies is a cybersecurity company focused on network security, cloud security, and threat prevention. Next-generation firewall development. Software blade architecture.

competitors.name: Cisco ASA
competitors.notes: Enterprise firewall and VPN leader, major Check Point competitor

competitors.name: Juniper Networks
competitors.notes: SRX series firewalls and security solutions

competitors.name: Fortinet
competitors.notes: Growing UTM/NGFW competitor with FortiGate appliances

competitors.notes: Emerging next-generation firewall vendor disrupting the market

competitors.name: McAfee
competitors.notes: Enterprise security software including network security
